body_html:
From comment in MaxPool1D module , MaxPool1D should accept 3D tensor( N * C * L). The actual backend is SpatialDilatedMaxPooling (THNN, THCUNN)，so we should change input to N * C * 1 * L 4D. The return indices will range from 0 to L. If we don't change input's size, the return indices will range 0 to L*C, this range will produce error in MaxUnpool1D.

So I think the solution is add a temporary size changing in MaxPool1D.
body_text:

The return indices will range from 0 to L.  If we don't change input's size, the return indices will range 0 to L*C, this range will produce error in MaxUnpool1D.
So I think the solution is add a temporary size changing in MaxPool1D.
body:
From comment in MaxPool1D module ,  MaxPool1D should accept 3D tensor( N * C * L). The actual backend is SpatialDilatedMaxPooling (THNN, THCUNN)，so we should change input to N * C * 1 * L 4D. The return indices will range from 0 to L.  If we don't change input's size, the return indices will range 0 to L*C, this range will produce error in MaxUnpool1D. 

So I think the solution is add a temporary size changing in MaxPool1D.
